summary:
I'm a freelance 3D Character Animator with a burning passion for the craft. My goal is to bring your exciting ideas to life, ranging from film and games to TV and commercials. I really enjoy working in a team on creative projects. Animation is great fun and I put a lot of hearth into it, without losing track of the project's goals and budget.

Characteristics that help me in this job: Focused, communicative, results driven, detailed, patient, creative thinker. 

Be sure to connect if you'd like to meet or if you are interested in working together:

E-mail: basravenart@gmail.com
Animation Demo Reel: https://vimeo.com/user132191689

Socials: 
https://basravenart.artstation.com/ 
https://www.instagram.com/basravenart

Work-related skills: Animation, Visualization (VR/AR), 3D Modeling, Sculpting, Illustration, Coordination, Community management, Presenting, Advising.

Creative and Technical Software experience: 
Blender (Advanced), Autodesk: Maya (Advanced), 3D Studio Max (Intermediate), Adobe: Photoshop (Intermediate), Animate (Intermediate), Premiere (Beginner)

Background:
Trained  in 3D animation by professional animators at the international online animation school 'Animation Mentor'. I have a Master's degree in Science (Biology) with a specialization in communication and participation ("Science in Society"). My Bachelor degree and in Education and additional acting classes helped me develop my communication and organizational skills.
